q1_besaid.name: The Stranger
q1_besaid.description: You washed up on Besaid Island. Wakka wants you to meet the Summoner at the temple.

q2_departure.name: Departure
q2_departure.description: Yuna begins her pilgrimage. Board the S.S. Liki.

q3_kilika_woods.name: Jungle Trek
q3_kilika_woods.description: Monsters infest the woods. Clear a path to the temple.

q4_kilika_temple.name: Trial of Fire
q4_kilika_temple.description: Complete the trials in Kilika Temple to gain the Aeon Ifrit.
objectives: Enter the Chamber of the Fayth

q5_luca.name: The Big Game
q5_luca.description: The Aurochs play today. But fiends are attacking the stadium.

q6_miihen.name: Chocobo Eater
q6_miihen.description: A monster is eating the Chocobos on the highroad.

q7_mushroom_rock.name: Operation Mi'ihen
q7_mushroom_rock.description: The Crusaders are using Machina to fight Sin. It won't end well.

q8_djose.name: Trial of Lightning
q8_djose.description: The thunderous temple of Djose awaits.

q9_moonflow.name: Crossing the Moonflow
q9_moonflow.description: Cross the river safely. Watch out for kidnappers.

q10_thunder_plains.name: Lightning Rods
q10_thunder_plains.description: Rikku is terrified of lightning. Get to the agency quickly.

q11_macalania_woods.name: Crystal Forest
q11_macalania_woods.description: A sphere in the woods reveals the truth about Jecht.

q12_macalania_temple.name: Trial of Ice
q12_macalania_temple.description: Seymour awaits at the temple. Confront him.

q13_bikanel.name: Lost in Sand
q13_bikanel.description: You are lost in the desert. Find Yuna.

q14_home.name: Homecoming
q14_home.description: The Guado are attacking the Al Bhed Home.

q15_bevelle.name: The Wedding
q15_bevelle.description: Crash the wedding and save Yuna from Seymour.

q16_calm_lands.name: The Calm Before
q16_calm_lands.description: The final rest before the end of the journey.

q17_gagazet.name: Mountain of the Ronso
q17_gagazet.description: The Ronso guard the path. Prove your strength.

q19_sin.name: Inside Sin
q19_sin.description: Defeat Sin and bring the Eternal Calm.
